pkgmetadata.longdescription: Kriging Method for Spatial Functional Data // A Kriging method for functional datasets with spatial dependency. This functional Kriging method avoids the need to estimate the trace-variogram, and the curve is estimated by minimizing a quadratic form. The curves in the functional dataset are smoothed using Fourier series. The functional Kriging of this package is a modification of the method proposed by Giraldo (2011) doi:10.1007/s10651-010-0143-y.
